articles.headline: New Study Finds That Dogs Are Better Than Cats
articles.blurb: A recent study conducted by researchers at the University of Woof found that dogs are superior to cats in every way.

articles.headline: Local Man Wins Hot Dog Eating Contest
articles.blurb: In a stunning upset, local resident Joey Chestnut took home first prize in this year's annual hot dog eating contest.

articles.headline: Scientists Discover New Planet Orbiting Distant Star
articles.blurb: A team of astronomers using the Hubble Space Telescope have discovered a new exoplanet orbiting a star located 400 light years away from Earth.
